column4: Is it possible to transfer to windows mobile 7 phone? lsusb seems to detect it, but i cant mount it or see it in rhythmbox, any ideas?
does a partition show up in: sudo fdisk -l
ok, reboot and login without the device attached, then plug it in and run:  dmesg | tail -n 20    it may give clues
not hugely informative, all it says is "a usb device is attached" etc
